DOC.brief_summary: This study assess meal distribution across day ( energy macronutrient intake ) relationship nutritional status nursing professional .
DOC.brief_title: Meal Distribution Across Day Female Nurses Working Shifts
DOC.detailed_description: 221 female nursing professional Brazilian University hospital classify three shift : day shift ( n=112 ) , night shift ( n=55 ) , day-night shift ( n=54 ) . Food intake assessment ( 3-day 24-hour recall ) ; Anthropometric variable ( weight , height , waist circumference hip circumference ) ; Sleep time work day day .
DOC.criteria: Eligible participant regularly employ hospital , 36hours per week scheduke , count additional shift overtime work . Volunteers supply necessary information development research pregnant lactating .
